fields.label: Google Sheets ID
fields.description: Enter the Google Sheets ID (the long string from the URL)

fields.label: Google Sheets API Key
fields.description: Enter your Google Sheets API key (for reading sheet information only)

fields.label: Service Account JSON
fields.description: Complete Google service account JSON credentials (required for writing data). Download from Google Cloud Console.

fields.label: Sheet Name
fields.description: Select the sheet/tab to add data to (will populate after entering Sheet ID and Service Account JSON)

fields.label: Row Data
fields.description: Data to add to the new row. Each item is a column value, in order.
